pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Iron Ore$(li)Clay Block$(li)Prismarine$(li)Dark Prismarine$(li)Soul Sand$(li)Mud Block$(li)Dripstone Block

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[210, 55, 60, 20, 0, 30]
This gem can be injected with a tier 2 injector setup.
